Air pollution would significantly decrease as there would be fewer vehicles emitting harmful gases into the atmosphere.
Health benefits would increase as people would be more physically active and experience improved cardiovascular health.
Traffic congestion would decrease as bicycles can travel at a slower pace and take up less space on the road.
Economic benefits would arise from the cost savings of not purchasing and maintaining cars, as well as the potential for a new industry focused on bicycle manufacturing and maintenance.
Communities would become more connected and social as people would be more likely to interact with their neighbors and passersby while traveling on their bicycles.
